org.melior.jdbc.datasource

Class DataSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.melior.jdbc.datasource.DataSourceConfig
      • org.melior.jdbc.datasource.DataSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Wrapper, CommonDataSource, DataSource

    public class DataSource
extends DataSourceConfig
implements DataSource
    Implements a factory for JDBC Connection objects, for connections to the physical data source that this DataSource object represents. The data source writes statistics from the underlying connection pool to the logs whenever a Connection is borrowed from the pool.
    Since:
    2.2
    Author:
    Melior
